name: PCPartPicker Dark Theme v0.96
description: A dark theme for the new PC Part Picker website.
additional_info:
***PLEASE LEAVE COMMENTS AND RATING THANK YOU***

The theme should work fine in every language. The theme was tested on Chrome. I need Firefox and Opera users to give me feedback! I hope your eyes will appreciate my effort :)

This theme is a part of a project I'm working on called Project Lights Off that aims to make as many websites dark with extensions, User styles (some made by me and some by others), etc. Please visit this link to give me feedback and any suggestions you have or if you are looking for more dark themes.

http://linustechtips.com/main/topic/313792-project-lights-off-making-websites-dark-one-by-one/ 

P.S I'm still learning CSS so go easy on me :P

CHANGELOG
Version 0.96
>>Combo deals links now more visable
>>Promo details are now readable (Thanks poisonblx for pointing it out)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.95
>>Custom part links background fixed (Thanks poisonblx for pointing it out)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.94
>>Compatibility Check text should now be readable.
>>Borders are now grey in the Current Part List topbar.
>>The draggable parts lists are now dark on the Saved Part Lists page.
>>Saved parts deletion popup is now dark.
>>Page indicator is now more visible.
>>Removed the Estimated voltage background colour and the bolt icon is now white to improve visibility.
>>Forum sticky threads now stand out (used the dark grey).
>>Moved the Search button (found when clicking the search icon in the topbar) to be more inside the search box for aesthetics.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.93
>>Fixed the notification to visit build guides on the parts list page.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.92
>>Fixed voting indicators and gave them colour (green=upvote/red=downvote)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.91
>>Fixed mail-in-rebate indicators
>>Fixed no comments text
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 0.9:
>>Everything should be themed correctly but I will need feedback to make sure!
First version of the theme.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

discussions.name: Custom Part URL - white on white
Text could be a bit darker.
